home_section_description_part_2: , a dedicated software engineer with deep expertise in web development, delivering innovative solutions.
about_section_text_part_2: I'm {{age}} years old with highly experience in creating attractive and functional user interfaces. Over the past {{experience}} years, I have worked for several companies and had the opportunity to contribute to the development of exciting web projects.
about_section_text_part_3: My strength lies in creating web experiences that not only meet user needs but also exceed their expectations. I'm dedicated to collaborative problem-solving, valuing diverse perspectives and actively seeking innovative solutions. My goal is to leverage my technical proficiency and interpersonal skills to drive successful projects, ensuring exceptional outcomes for users.

projects_section_text_part_2: I'm always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn something new

tech_stack_section_text_part_2: Browse the tools and technologies that power my web development journey. Each icon represents a piece of the puzzle, embodying innovation and efficiency in each project.
contact_form_description: I'm always open to new opportunities and challenges. If you want to get in touch, please fill out the form below and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
spacie_subtitle: Elevating Influencer Marketing to a New Level with Spacie.
spacie_description: A plataform that connects companies with influencers for promotional campaigns. The system integrates with Google, Instagram, and TikTok using the OAuth2 protocol, allowing users to utilize their information from these platforms on Spacie.
spacie_long_description_01: Spacie is an innovative platform that serves as a strategic bridge between companies and influencers, offering a comprehensive solution for promotional campaigns. With its user-centered approach, Spacie brings together all the essential tools needed to create, manage, and analyze influencer marketing campaigns effectively.
spacie_long_description_02: Companies can use Spacie to create customized campaigns according to their specific goals and requirements. The platform offers an advanced matching system that facilitates the identification of ideal influencers for collaborations. This is done by considering criteria such as the target audience, reach, and brand affinity, resulting in strategic partnerships that maximize campaign impact.
spacie_long_description_03: Influencers also find a valuable tool in Spacie for managing their influencer marketing activities. They can access advanced metrics from their linked social networks, allowing them to track follower growth, engagement, and other relevant data. Additionally, influencers have the ability to generate comprehensive and detailed reports of their metrics, providing valuable insights into the performance of their campaigns and the evolution of their audiences.
spacie_long_description_04: Spacie's seamless integration with leading social media platforms like Google, Instagram, and TikTok through the OAuth2 protocol ensures the security and ease of access to social media account information. This simplifies the entire process of planning, executing, and evaluating campaigns, enabling companies and influencers to make data-driven strategic decisions.
spacie_long_description_05: In summary, Spacie is a comprehensive platform that empowers companies and influencers to achieve exceptional results in promotional campaigns. Its user-centered approach, along with advanced features and an intuitive interface, makes Spacie a leading choice in the world of influencer marketing.
cs_analytics_subtitle: Empowering CS:GO Enthusiasts with In-Depth Analytics: The CS Analytics Story.
cs_analytics_description: This is a website that offers comprehensive statistics, sourced from HLTV, along with personalized analysis by administrators for CS:GO players, teams, and championships. The user can dive deeper into the world of Counter-Strike: Global Offensive with huge data-driven insights.
cs_analytics_alt: CS Analytics Image - CS:GO statistics platform
cs_analytics_long_description_01: The CS Analytics serves as an expansive statistical hub empowering users to delve deeper into the intricate universe of Counter-Strike: Global Offensive, granting them access to profound data-driven insights.
cs_analytics_long_description_02: At the core of this project lies a meticulous data aggregation process, spanning from live match updates to in-depth player profiles, making it an invaluable resource for CS:GO enthusiasts.
cs_analytics_long_description_03: In my role as a front-end developer, I had the privilege of leading the front-end team, which marked my initiation into a leadership position. As the team leader, I played a pivotal role in crafting the user experience and interface of the platform. My responsibilities encompassed not only active contributions to the codebase but also ensuring the seamless integration of data-driven insights into the user interface. Working in close collaboration with other team members, we collectively pursued the project's objectives. This multifaceted experience not only honed my technical proficiency but also nurtured essential leadership skills that I continue to apply and refine.
expert_stats_subtitle: Elevating Virtual Football Analysis: My Journey with Expert Stats.
expert_stats_description: Expert Stats is a platform dedicated to providing comprehensive statistics on virtual football, encompassing four different leagues. What sets it apart is its real-time information delivery, ensuring that users have access to up-to-the-minute data. It offers extensive odds, recent match data, and detailed statistics for upcoming games, providing a complete insight into the fascinating world of virtual football.
expert_stats_alt: Expert Stats Image - Virtual football statistics platform
expert_stats_long_description_01: As a frontend developer, I had the opportunity to contribute to the Expert Stats project by implementing enhancements and fixes. This experience was particularly significant for me as it marked my first real project using Angular and RxJs. Furthermore, it was my inaugural experience working on a production project with active users, allowing me not only to refine the user interface but also to gain practical experience in the backend using Node.js, albeit briefly.
chirp_subtitle: Exploring the Emoji Universe: Developing a Unique Twitter.
chirp_description: This is a unique Twitter made by my own, where the user can only use emojis. It served as an excellent project to enhance my knowledge and practice various technologies and design patterns.
chirp_long_description_01: In this project, I had the opportunity to learn and implement the Next.js API with the innovative trpc, as well as to utilize the robust Prisma, hosted on the scalable infrastructure of Planet Scale. This allowed me to deepen my knowledge in web development and explore new technological horizons.
massagueirinha_menu_subtitle: Crafting Culinary Delights: From Restaurant Menu to an Enhanced Gatsby Website.
massagueirinha_menu_description: A website for a restaurant menu, where the user can view the dishes and their prices. It was a project that I initially developed to be a restaurant menu website, but I ended up transforming it into a website for a fictitious restaurant menu.
massagueirinha_menu_long_description_01: During the execution of this project, I had the opportunity to learn and apply the functionality of Gatsby to create highly SEO-optimized static websites. This experience not only improved my web development skills but also allowed me to create a user-friendly and efficient platform for restaurant menu viewing.
bull_blockchain_subtitle: Enhancing Online Presence and User Experience for Bull Blockchain.
bull_blockchain_description: A website for a blockchain company, where the user can view the company's information and services.
bull_blockchain_alt: Bull Blockchain Image - Blockchain company website
bull_blockchain_long_description_01: The Bull Blockchain project initially started as a refactoring effort for an existing website, aiming to incorporate new development standards and enhanced SEO techniques. However, regrettably, the project was eventually discontinued due to the client's later lack of interest in implementing the planned changes.
bull_blockchain_long_description_02: This website was designed to provide users with an informative and interactive experience, allowing them to access detailed information about the company, its services, and areas of expertise. Additionally, it offered a direct communication channel, making it easy for users to get in touch with the company for inquiries or requests.
bull_blockchain_long_description_03: The Bull Blockchain project's primary goal was to enhance the company's online presence, showcasing its expertise in the blockchain field and providing visitors with a comprehensive view of its services and capabilities. To achieve this objective, modern development techniques and advanced SEO strategies were applied, ensuring that the site stood out in search results and provided a high-quality user experience.
car_rent_subtitle: Revolutionizing Car Rental: A Journey with Handlebars, Bootstrap, and Authentication.
car_rent_description: This project marked a significant milestone in my journey as a developer as it was my first endeavor with the use of Handlebars, Bootstrap, and other technologies such as Node.js, Express, SASS, MongoDB, Alpine.js, and Yup. We developed a car rental system with authentication, which, although simple in nature, offered a rich learning experience.
car_rent_alt: Car Rent Image - Car rental system
car_rent_long_description_01: Combining the flexibility of Handlebars for dynamic page creation with the efficiency of Bootstrap for responsive design, the project provided an ideal environment for exploring the creation of elegant and functional user interfaces. Integration with MongoDB allowed for the secure storage of user data and rental records, while the use of Alpine.js added a layer of interactivity to the system.
car_rent_long_description_02: The Car Rent project was a valuable learning experience, allowing me to explore the intricacies of web development and gain practical experience with a wide range of technologies. It was also a great opportunity to collaborate with other developers, working together to achieve a common goal. This experience not only enhanced my technical proficiency but also nurtured my interpersonal skills, which are essential for successful teamwork.
localize_subtitle: Reinventing Car Rental with React Native, Expo, and Innovative Authentication.
localize_description: This project was an exciting opportunity to enhance my skills in React Native, Expo, and Redux, as well as to create innovative authentication that added significant value to the car rental system.
localize_long_description_01: One of the highlights of this project was the implementation of an authentication system inspired by IFOOD, which allowed users to be validated through their phone numbers and receive confirmation codes via WhatsApp. Additionally, this project would not have been possible without the collaboration of a friend who helped me with authentication on the backend, making it even more rewarding and reinforcing the importance of collaboration in software development.
localize_long_description_02: Overall, this project was an exciting opportunity to enhance my skills in React Native, Expo, and Redux, as well as to create innovative authentication that added significant value to the car rental system.
inkPen_description: I started at inkPen as a volunteer, developing front-end applications for web and mobile with React, React Native, and Next.js. During this period, I learned a lot about product development and teamwork. After a year, I became a partner and took on the technical leadership role, coordinating the development team and participating directly in the creation and evolution of the product. My focus was to ensure that the solutions delivered were efficient, well-built, and aligned with the company's goals.
opd_description: I worked as a front-end developer for web in the SASS, the main solution of the company, focused on personal trainers. I mainly used Angular and Typescript to improve and develop new functionalities for the web application. Throughout the year, I learned a lot about collaboration between different areas of a company, such as product development, marketing, customer service, and the technical team.
lisbom_dev_description: I worked as a front-end freelancer, working on new projects and contributing to the maintenance of existing projects. I had the opportunity to apply my programming and technology skills in front-end development to create innovative solutions and improve the functionality of already implemented projects.
truck_up_description: I was responsible for maintaining the front-end of the management platform for all processes and data of the company's main case, the Truck Up app, using technologies such as JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Material UI and GIT.
tracking_trade_description: I primarily work as a front-end developer in maintaining and developing new features for the company's SaaS products. I contribute with a greater focus on JavaScript, React and its frameworks, such as Next.js. My biggest contribution has been to one of the company's main software products, PriceTrack.

name_max_length_error: The name must have at most 50 characters
message_min_length_error: The message must have at least 5 characters
message_max_length_error: The message must have at most 1000 characters
